Text: RR Receipt Point Allocation Cc At the technical conference held July EPNG committed to sending you election forms in order for us to prepare four studies Attached is a letter instructions and the form Please be sure to return the forms no later than close of business Monday July via email to The above distribution list is not complete as some customers were not represented at the technical conference We are contacting those customers in order to obtain email addresses and we will send them a similar email tomorrow Receipt Election Instructionsdoc Receipt Electiondoc Supply Selection Formxls Thank you This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender Receipt Election Instructionsdoc Receipt Electiondoc Supply Selection Formxls
